sentence.Network_en: He lost his position and had to take a humbler teaching job.
sentence.Network_cn: 他失去了工作,不得不从事较为卑微的教书工作.

sentence.Network_en: The humbler gentes had their common rites.
sentence.Network_cn: 卑微的氏族有其共同仪典.

sentence.Network_en: Their humbler followers , such as partridges, have a like power of strong propulsion, but soon tire.
sentence.Network_cn: 它们的低级同类, 如鹧鸪, 有一种同样大的推动力, 但很快就疲劳了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以h开头的英语英文单词 ... humbleness 谦逊,卑贱,粗鄙 humbler 较低级的 humbly 恭顺地，谦卑地.
humbler followers , such as partridges , have a like power of strong propulsion , but soon tire ., 次于野鸭和鸽子的鸟 , 如鹧鸪 , 有相似的巨大推动力 , 但很快会疲劳.

list.abs: please ask God to rid of our pride and help us to become humbler servants .请求神释放我们的骄傲，帮助我们成为谦卑的仆人。
the humbler gentes had their common rites .卑微的氏族有其共同仪典。
But there are many humbler forms of the same kind of pleasure ., 不过 , 还有很多种看似卑微的快乐.

entry.def: A humble person is not proud and does not believe that they are better than other people.

example.ex: He gave a great performance, but he was very humble...
example.tran: 他的表演非常出色，但他却很谦虚。

example.ex: Andy was a humble, courteous and gentle man.
example.tran: 安迪是个谦逊而且彬彬有礼的绅士。

entry.def: People with low social status are sometimes described as humble.

example.ex: Spyros Latsis started his career as a humble fisherman in the Aegean...
example.tran: 斯皮罗斯·拉齐斯的第一份职业是爱琴海上一名地位卑贱的渔夫。

example.ex: He came from a fairly humble, poor background.
example.tran: 他出生在一个地位相当低下的贫穷家庭。

entry.tran: 粗陋的;简陋的;不起眼的
entry.def: A humble place or thing is ordinary and not special in any way.

example.ex: There are restaurants, both humble and expensive, that specialize in them...
example.tran: 专门做这些菜的餐馆既有毫不起眼的也有价格昂贵的。

example.ex: Varndell made his own reflector for these shots from a strip of humble kitchen foil.
example.tran: 瓦恩德尔用一狭条普通的厨房用箔纸自制了反光板来拍摄这些照片。

entry.def: People use humble in a phrase such as in my humble opinion as a polite way of emphasizing what they think, even though they do not feel humble about it.

example.ex: It is, in my humble opinion, perhaps the best steak restaurant in Great Britain.
example.tran: 依拙见，这可能是英国最好的牛排馆。

entry.def: If you eat humble pie, you speak or behave in a way which tells people that you admit you were wrong about something.

example.ex: Anson was forced to eat humble pie and publicly apologise to her.
example.tran: 安森被迫认错并公开向她道歉。

entry.def: If you humble someone who is more important or powerful than you, you defeat them easily.

example.ex: Honda won fame in the 1980s as the little car company that humbled the industry giants...
example.tran: 本田在20世纪80年代作为一家轻易挫败行业巨头的小汽车公司而声名鹊起。

example.ex: Third-placed Barnet were humbled 3-0 at Crewe.
example.tran: 排名第三的巴尼特队以0–3的比分在克鲁遭遇惨败。

entry.tran: 使谦逊;使感到卑微;羞辱
entry.def: If something or someone humbles you, they make you realize that you are not as important or good as you thought you were.

example.tran: 特德的话让我感到自惭。

example.ex: I am sure millions of viewers were humbled by this story.
example.tran: 我相信数百万观众看了这个故事后都会感到自己的渺小。

auth_sentence.content: But the first item is a reminder of humbler times.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the first item is a reminder of humbler times.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the first item is a reminder of humbler times.

auth_sentence.content: The new pontiff has already set a clear tone for a humbler papacy and Church.
auth_sentence.res_content: The new pontiff has already set a clear tone for a humbler papacy and Church.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The new pontiff has already set a clear tone for a humbler papacy and Church.

auth_sentence.content: His answer was humbler than the official "End State" declaration that had been affixed to his office wall in Baghdad.
auth_sentence.res_content: His answer was humbler than the official "End State" declaration that had been affixed to his office wall in Baghdad.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His answer was humbler than the official "End State" declaration that had been affixed to his office wall in Baghdad.
